alert.note: Alert for Linn; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 08 at 2:23PM CDT until June 10 at 12:20PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Grand River near Chillicothe affecting Linn MO and Livingston Counties. Wakenda Creek at Carrollton affecting Carroll County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Grand River near Pattonsburg affecting Daviess and Gentry Counties. Grand River near Sumner affecting Linn MO, Chariton, Livingston and Carroll Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Grand River near Chillicothe. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Low-lying cropland floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 14.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 24.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
